title: Just Josie and the Lucky Number 7!
description: ''I don't have a dog, but I have a little sister!''Meet Josephine Emily, but she prefers that you call her Just Josie. And meet her boastful neighbor Zac. He said that his dog is the best in the world! But Josie plans Operation Lily, her BEST IDEA EVER, to show Zac what her little sister can do!
author: Emily Gale
